article_node.title: Google is supercharging screenshot editing on your Pixel with Android 16 QPR2 Beta 1
article_node.summary: Google has introduced an enhanced screenshot editing feature for Pixel phones with the Android 16 QPR2 Beta 1, allowing users to edit screenshots directly in the Pixel Studio app. This new app offers advanced editing tools, including AI-powered options that enable users to describe changes they want to make, although initial tests showed some limitations. Additionally, Pixel Studio provides various editing functionalities such as cropping, highlighting, and adding captions.
